questionTitle: Google Talk is a Windows only VoIP service on the desktop that uses the ________ protocol.
questionExplanation: It supports communication with mobile XMPP clients such as the Nokia N900 Smartphone, Blackberry, iPhone, and Android phones.

questionOption1: Video streaming over the Internet has become one of the major broadcast transmission media
questionOption2: The Internet’s “Wayback Machine” stores past versions of the Internet and includes some interesting and significant out-of-copyright video content
questionOption3: Kyte is a video platform for live and on-demand content streamed to online, mobile, and social media platforms
questionExplanation: Video streaming is one of these technologies that benefits greatly from deployment in the cloud.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the most widespread video streaming service?
questionExplanation: Metacafe is an entertainment site with movie trailers, TV shows, video games, and more.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the largest video sharing site?
questionExplanation: YuMe is a video advertising company.

questionOption1: Veoh serves TV and movie content from major studios, along with uploaded user content
questionOption2: UStream.tv is a live video event streaming service
questionOption3: RuTube is a popular Japanese video-sharing site
questionExplanation: RuTube is a popular Russian video-sharing site.

questionTitle: Which of the following application is an example of TV over the Internet?
questionExplanation: Hulu was launched in 2007 as a joint venture by ABC, Fox, and NBC to offer content to viewers.

questionTitle: Which of the following movie subscription service has moved to the cloud?
questionExplanation: Netflix also is expected to use the cloud deployment to expand the support of other devices.

questionTitle: Which of the following can be best be described as a digital media receiver?
questionExplanation: Google TV is a media center software platform that will appear in some HDTVs.

questionTitle: Which of the following media players can view HTML5 content?
questionExplanation: Kodi (formerly XBMC) is a free and open-source media player software developed by the XBMC Foundation.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the most widely used streaming video file container format?
questionExplanation: H.264 is used as the streaming format for most large video sites, such as YouTube and iTunes.
